citation: Proclamation under the Alcohol and Drug Dependency Repeal Act 2021 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Alcohol and Drug Dependency Repeal Act 2021

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Alcohol and Drug Dependency Repeal Act 2021 fix 1 March 2022 as the day on which that Act commences.

7 February 2022

B. BAKER

Governor

By Her Excellency's Command,

JEREMY ROCKLIFF

Minister for Health

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 16 February 2022

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Health.
